about_the_game:
《Summon Legion》 is a game that summons warriors from another world to fight against terrifying dark monsters, facing a tide of enemies,The only way to defend is to summon warriors, gunners, and others to form your own legion to fight against the surging enemy. Can you hold the last line of defense?

Game Features:
- More than 50 adventure mode levels, including multiple scenes

- Endless mode containing multiple maps

- Dozens of types of enemies with different skills make the game more challenging

- More than 60 different summoned warriors

- Collect coins to unlock more warriors and special cards in the store

- Enemy surge. Watch the line

QQ群：452307002

name: Summon Legion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
